summary: This is the story of a teenager at the turn of the century in the conservative higher classes of Chile and the initiation rites in his society.
cast: Elsa Alarcón|Jorge Álvarez|Luis Alarcón|Magdalena Aguirre|Rafael Benavente|Shlomit Baytelman|José Cabello|María Castiglione|Tennyson Ferrada|Ana González|Delfina Guzmán|Pedro Gaete|Alfonso Luco|Gloria Münchmeyer|Juan Cristóbal Meza|María Elena Montero|Ana María Palma|Felipe Rabat|Aquiles Sepúlveda|Fritz Stein|José Manuel Salcedo|Lucy Salgado|Marión Soto|Nissim Sharim|Victor Sepúlveda|Vicente Santamaría|Sergio Urrutia|Jaime Vadell|Jorge Yáñez|Violeta Contreras|Marcial Edwards
title: Julio Comienza en Julio
